responses.rationale: The segment reports facts about past cases but contains no negation or calming cue.
The segment reports facts about a case and recovery but contains no negation or calming cue.
The segment reports facts about a new case but contains no negation or calming cue.
The segment reports a fact about a new case but contains no negation or calming cue.
The segment reports a fact about vaccine doses secured but contains no negation or calming cue.
The segment contains an explicit calming cue ('risk... is considered to be low'), so it is not a bare negation without calming.
The segment contains the bare negation 'no active cases' without an explicit calming cue.
The segment contains the bare negation 'no confirmed human-to-human transfers' without an explicit calming cue.
